definitions.definition: ( Middle East architecture , archaic ) A raised area of a building 's floor , usually covered with carpeting , used for sitting .
( furniture ) An upholstered seat with a raised back and one or two raised ends , long enough to comfortably accommodate two or more people .
examples: He bought a big sofa two days before his relatives arrived.

main_definition: ( Middle East architecture , archaic ) A raised area of a building 's floor , usually covered with carpeting , used for sitting .
secondary_definitions: ( furniture ) An upholstered seat with a raised back and one or two raised ends , long enough to comfortably accommodate two or more people .

definitions.definition: A slave soldier who served in the army of the Mali Empire.

main_definition: ( historical ) A slave soldier who served in the army of the Mali Empire.
